name: Revolvertales
description:
The game was going to have more effects on crits and more enemy types, but due to some production issues these were not implemented in time, neither were all the levels planned and partially created.

There are known bugs:

There is no cooldown on dodging, drinking or shooting.

The options menu does not work correctly, audio settings seem to do nothing

Camera will reset when camera lock on is used and enemy dies, this can be a bit jarring.

The menu can only be navigated with a mouse

There is some weirdness with mouse locking in the menus at times.

Probably more things we didn't even notice yet!
